text: budgets ignored turned my friend’s life upside down gotta watch out
planning schmanning stores teach ya agility beats manuals
stock up on normal stuff like coffee
old ways die hard esp when u gotta smile at customers treating you like their grandma instead of business owner tricks up your sleeve make all difference just keep flipping their script
ran my shop for years dealing with suppliers always doubting cuz im mujer had to play hardball show em business knows no gender just smarts & grit
even shop sales get boxed by old school thinking
